metadata.title: CVE-2024-23214 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.3, iOS 16.7.5 and iPadOS16.7.5, iOS 17.3 and iPadOS 17.3. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
